mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, M.ID,C.CONTENTS_NO,R.REVIEW_TITLE, R.REVIEW_CONTENTS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC) AS RNUM, REVIEW_NO, ID, CONTENTS_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENTS FROM REVIEW) R, MEMBER M, CONTENTS C WHERE R.ID = M.ID AND R.CONTENTS_NO = C.CONTENTS_NO AND RNUM BETWEEN #{startRowNumber} AND #{endRowNumber} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL

mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO,R.REVIEW_TITLE,R.REVIEW_LIKES,TO_CHAR(R.REVIEW_POSTED_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REVIEW_POSTED_TIME,M.ID,R.REVIEW_HITS,R.REVIEW_CONTENTS FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M WHERE R.ID = M.ID AND REVIEW_NO = #{VALUE}
